name: Foot-Eye Adventures
description: The last project for my game development class was to make a platformer.  I sat around wondering what to make until I decided to base it off the Foot-Eye.  The Foot-Eye is a little creature my Dad made up when I was young.  He would draw pictures of it and place them in my lunch box.  Now the foot eye will live on in the messy little platformer I made for school.
